section_title: Issue out of the Consolidated Fund for the year ending 31st March 1989
section_text: 1   The Treasury  may issue out of the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom and apply towards making good the supply granted to Her Majesty for the service of the year ending on 31st March 1989 the sum of £10,366,96582.

section_title: Issue out of the Consolidated Fund for the year ending 31st March 1990
section_text: 2   The Treasury  may issue out of the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom and apply towards making good the supply granted to Her Majesty for the service of the year ending on 31st March 1990 the sum of £4,951,397,000.

section_title: Issue out of the Consolidated Fund for the year ending 31st March 1991
section_text: 3   The Treasury may issue out of the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom and apply towards making good the supply granted to Her Majesty for the service of the year ending on 31st March 1991 the sum of £1,060,000,000.
4   This Act may be cited as the Consolidated Fund Act 1990.
